statements: SELECT content_title, author_name FROM content_publishing_schedule WHERE category = 'Technology' ORDER BY publish_date ASC
SELECT * FROM content_publishing_schedule WHERE publish_date >= '2022-01-01' AND publish_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT author_name, content_title, publish_date FROM content_publishing_schedule WHERE author_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY publish_date DESC
SELECT content_title FROM content_publishing_schedule WHERE category = 'Health'
SELECT * FROM content_publishing_schedule ORDER BY author_name
SELECT * FROM content_publishing_schedule WHERE author_name = 'John Doe' ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT content_title, category FROM content_publishing_schedule WHERE publish_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY category ASC;
SELECT id, content_title, author_name FROM content_publishing_schedule WHERE category = 'Technology' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM content_publishing_schedule WHERE author_name = 'Alice Smith' AND category = 'Fashion' ORDER BY publish_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT author_name, COUNT(*) AS article_count FROM content_publishing_schedule GROUP BY author_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM publishing_schedule ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT id, content_title, category FROM publishing_schedule WHERE category = 'News';
SELECT content_title, publish_date FROM publishing_schedule WHERE publish_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, editor, editorial_date FROM editorial_calendar ORDER BY editorial_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM editorial_calendar WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT content_title, publish_date FROM publishing_schedule ORDER BY publish_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT id, content_title, publish_date, category FROM publishing_schedule WHERE category='Tech' AND publish_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT editorial_date, editor FROM editorial_calendar WHERE status='Pending' ORDER BY editorial_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id AS article_id, editorial_date AS scheduled_date, editor AS assigned_editor FROM editorial_calendar WHERE status='Scheduled' ORDER BY scheduled_date DESC LIMIT 2;

SELECT content_title, publish_date, category FROM publishing_schedule JOIN editorial_calendar ON publishing_schedule.id = editorial_calendar.article_id WHERE editorial_calendar.status='Scheduled' AND publish_date > '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM content_publishing_schedule;
SELECT title, publish_date FROM content_publishing_schedule ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT author FROM content_publishing_schedule WHERE title='Example Title';
SELECT author_name, email FROM content_author WHERE author_id=1;
SELECT * FROM editorial_calendar WHERE status='Approved' ORDER BY publish_date ASC;
SELECT title, publish_date, author FROM content_publishing_schedule WHERE publish_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, title FROM content_publishing_schedule WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT author_name, email FROM content_author WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT id, status FROM editorial_calendar WHERE status = 'published' ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT author, publish_date FROM content_publishing_schedule JOIN editorial_calendar ON content_publishing_schedule.id = editorial_calendar.content_id;
SELECT * FROM publishing_schedule;
SELECT content_id, publish_date FROM publishing_schedule WHERE publish_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT author_name, email_address FROM content_authors ORDER BY author_name DESC;
SELECT content_title, publish_status FROM editorial_calendar WHERE publish_status = 'Published';
SELECT category_name FROM content_categories WHERE category_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY category_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM publishing_schedule ORDER BY publish_date DESC, schedule_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT content_title, author_id FROM editorial_calendar WHERE publish_status = 'Published';
SELECT author_name, email_address FROM content_authors WHERE author_id = 3;
SELECT schedule_id, content_id, publish_date FROM publishing_schedule WHERE publish_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY publish_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM content_categories ORDER BY category_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM team_members;
SELECT title, author FROM content ORDER BY author DESC;
SELECT category_name, count(*) as total FROM content_categories GROUP BY category_name;
SELECT calendar_id, year, month FROM editorial_calendar WHERE year = 2022;
SELECT schedule_id, content_id, publish_date, status FROM publishing_schedule WHERE status = 'approved';
SELECT * FROM publishing_schedule WHERE status = 'Approved' ORDER BY publish_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT content.title, team_members.name FROM content INNER JOIN team_members ON content.author = team_members.name WHERE content.publish_status = true ORDER BY content.title ASC

SELECT content.title, editorial_calendar.month, editorial_calendar.year FROM content INNER JOIN editorial_calendar ON content.content_id = editorial_calendar.calendar_id WHERE editorial_calendar.year = 2022
SELECT content.title, content_categories.category_name FROM content INNER JOIN content_categories ON content.category = content_categories.category_name ORDER BY content.title ASC LIMIT 10

SELECT team_members.name, team_members.role, COUNT(*) AS total_content FROM team_members INNER JOIN content ON team_members.name = content.author GROUP BY team_members.name, team_members.role ORDER BY total_content DESC
